pages.text: $(l)Soul Shards$() are items dropped by mobs in The Vault. They can be automatically collected in unlimited numbers in the $(l)Soul Shard Pouch.$()
Many Vault Items have a $(l)Soul Value$(). The Soul Value can be converted to $(l)Soul Dust$() in the $(l)Vault Soul Diffuser$(). Soul dust can be crafted into Soul Shards.
The Black Market is a shop to convert $(l)Soul Shards$() to $(l)Vault Items$(). The listed items in the Black Market are individual by each player.
The Black Market's stock resets after buying one of the listed items or automatically after 24 hours. Buying a random item does not reset listed items.
